name: docpad-plugin-eco
description: Adds support for the Eco templating engine to DocPad.
readme:
# ECO Plugin for DocPad [![Build Status](http://img.shields.io/travis-ci/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco.png?branch=master)](http://travis-ci.org/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco "Check this project's build status on TravisCI") [![NPM version](http://badge.fury.io/js/docpad-plugin-eco.png)](https://npmjs.org/package/docpad-plugin-eco "View this project on NPM") [![Dependency Status](https://david-dm.org/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco.png?theme=shields.io)](https://david-dm.org/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco) [![Development Dependency Status](https://david-dm.org/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco/dev-status.png?theme=shields.io)](https://david-dm.org/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco#info=devDependencies)
[![Gittip donate button](http://img.shields.io/gittip/docpad.png)](https://www.gittip.com/docpad/ "Donate weekly to this project using Gittip") [![Flattr donate button](http://img.shields.io/flattr/donate.png?color=yellow)](http://flattr.com/thing/344188/balupton-on-Flattr "Donate monthly to this project using Flattr") [![PayPayl donate button](http://img.shields.io/paypal/donate.png?color=yellow)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=QB8GQPZAH84N6 "Donate once-off to this project using Paypal") [![BitCoin donate button](http://img.shields.io/bitcoin/donate.png?color=yellow)](https://coinbase.com/checkouts/9ef59f5479eec1d97d63382c9ebcb93a "Donate once-off to this project using BitCoin") [![Wishlist browse button](http://img.shields.io/wishlist/browse.png?color=yellow)](http://amzn.com/w/2F8TXKSNAFG4V "Buy an item on our wishlist for us") Adds support for the [ECO](https://github.com/sstephenson/eco/) (embedded CoffeeScript templates) templating engine to [DocPad](https://docpad.org) Convention: `.anything.eco` ## Install ``` docpad install eco ``` ## History [Discover the change history by heading on over to the `HISTORY.md` file.](https://github.com/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco/blob/master/HISTORY.md#files) ## Contribute [Discover how you can contribute by heading on over to the `CONTRIBUTING.md` file.](https://github.com/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#files) ## Backers ### Maintainers These amazing people are maintaining this project: - Benjamin Lupton (https://github.com/balupton) ### Sponsors No sponsors yet! Will you be the first? [![Gittip donate button](http://img.shields.io/gittip/docpad.png)](https://www.gittip.com/docpad/ "Donate weekly to this project using Gittip") [![Flattr donate button](http://img.shields.io/flattr/donate.png?color=yellow)](http://flattr.com/thing/344188/balupton-on-Flattr "Donate monthly to this project using Flattr") [![PayPayl donate button](http://img.shields.io/paypal/donate.png?color=yellow)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=QB8GQPZAH84N6 "Donate once-off to this project using Paypal") [![BitCoin donate button](http://img.shields.io/bitcoin/donate.png?color=yellow)](https://coinbase.com/checkouts/9ef59f5479eec1d97d63382c9ebcb93a "Donate once-off to this project using BitCoin") [![Wishlist browse button](http://img.shields.io/wishlist/browse.png?color=yellow)](http://amzn.com/w/2F8TXKSNAFG4V "Buy an item on our wishlist for us") ### Contributors These amazing people have contributed code to this project: - [Benjamin Lupton](https://github.com/balupton) — [view contributions](https://github.com/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco/commits?author=balupton) - [Zearin](https://github.com/Zearin) — [view contributions](https://github.com/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco/commits?author=Zearin) [Become a contributor!](https://github.com/docpad/docpad-plugin-eco/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#files) ## License Licensed under the incredibly [permissive](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permissive_free_software_licence) [MIT license](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/MIT/) Copyright © 2012+ Bevry Pty Ltd (http://bevry.me)
